inclusion.criterion: Established diagnosis of COPD with FEV1 <60% predicted
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: spirometry revealed post-bronchodilator FEV1/FVC = 60% of predicted values

inclusion.criterion: FEV1/FVC <70% and <+15% FEV1 response to bronchodilator.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: spirometry revealed post-bronchodilator FEV1/FVC = 60% of predicted values

inclusion.criterion: Patients of both genders will be included.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: IRB approved written informed consent will be obtained from each subject.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known hypersensitivity to beta agonists, theophylline, steroids, or roflumilast.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current or recent (<2 weeks) treatment with oral steroids, theophylline or other methylxanthines, or roflumlast.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: uncontrolled hypertension, or congestive heart failure.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath about a day before. He has a known case of COPD since 2 years ago and smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
